skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: Learn modern web development with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and responsive design. Build real projects including responsive websites, interactive web apps, and deploy them to the internet. Perfect for career changers and students.

skills.name: Guitar Lessons
skills.description: Master the guitar from basics to advanced techniques. Learn chord progressions, strumming patterns, fingerpicking, and your favorite songs. Acoustic and electric guitar instruction available.

skills.name: Cooking Classes
skills.description: Discover the joy of cooking with hands-on classes covering international cuisines, knife skills, meal planning, and presentation. Learn to create delicious, healthy meals from scratch.

skills.name: Language Exchange
skills.description: Practice conversational skills in English, Spanish, and Mandarin through structured language exchange. Improve pronunciation, grammar, and cultural understanding in a supportive environment.

skills.name: Photography
skills.description: Learn photography fundamentals including composition, lighting, and post-processing. Covers portrait, landscape, and street photography with both digital and film techniques.

skills.name: Fitness Training
skills.description: Build strength, endurance, and flexibility through structured workout programs. Includes weight training, cardio, and mobility work tailored to individual fitness goals and abilities.
